Explosion.display_help: Gremlins will detonate themselves in a crisis, and attempt to take a few foes with them.
Explosion.display_target_help: Gremlins will detonate themselves in a crisis, and attempt to take a few foes with them.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
The {PlayerSource} shocks you and drains some of your Endurance!
